title: Veneer Door
description: At Kastha we bring two different range of veneer doors that match your home or office decor.

title: Laminate Door
description: We at Kastha offer high pressure laminate doors that are stunningly beautiful, stronger and durable.

title: Skin Door
description: Skin door can never go out of fashion, paint skin doors are known to provide a classy, more comfortable and warmer atmosphere. We at Abhimanya got skin doors in different sizes and colors as per the end users requirement, we provide those that are flawlessly beautiful. We offer quality paint skin doors at the most competitive price.

title: Royal Paint Door
description: Royal paint doors are made of wood, externally material has to be painted more times in order to obtain the perfect color and covered with top quality finish. We use automated spray machine to get controlled thickness of paint and get uniform coverage for smooth and high quality finish.
